Learning Laravel 5.1 - Installing and Setup

27 Jun, 2016 - web-development, tutorial -

This is the first in a series of Laravel tutorials. My aim is to split them up into independant tutorials that you can pick up at any time

  1. Composer
  2. VirtualBox & VMware
  3. Homestead
  4. Laravel

Composer

download curl

php composer.phar

composer

mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer

set to go
